room_title: Escape room "Tick Tok" by Panic Room CT in Stamford
review: What a day! The Tick Tok room was great, and the staff was fantastic! A birthday I will never forget.

room_title: Escape room "Tick Tok" by Panic Room CT in Stamford
review: This was our first escape room. We did Tik Tok and loved it, came very close to solving it with only two locks left. I was worried it might not be something we all would enjoy, but that was not the case. Our group ranged from 16-21 and we all agreed we will definitely do it again! Super fun and challenging!

room_title: Escape room "Tick Tok" by Panic Room CT in Stamford
review: What a fun, unique time! Great couples night out! Would highly recommend!! Can't wait to do it again! (And break the record again!!!)

room_title: Escape room "Tick Tok" by Panic Room CT in Stamford
review: My husband and I took our children (16-21) and their friends. We had a great time! This is a wonderful "game" to play where the cell phones are not just put away but you don't even think about them. We can't wait to book a different room and do it all over again! Thanks Panic Room!
